hints.content:
To find how many fewer $\blueE{\text{snowballs}}$ than $\purpleD{\text{icicles}}$ Elsa has, we need the difference.  So, we subtract.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/5c08e7d54d1c69470cd5f2a5fac80d1b99bd146e)

$\purpleD{32} - \blueE{17} = \maroonD{\square}$

Let's subtract to find how many fewer snowballs.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/6a604936f8e773576717c35a769c813a1a8b2253)

$\purpleD{32} - \blueE{17} = \maroonD{15}$
Elsa has $\maroonD{15}$ fewer snowballs than icicles.

question.content:
Elsa has $17$ snowballs and $32$ icicles. 

**How many fewer snowballs than icicles does Elsa have?**  

[[â˜ƒ input-number 1]] fewer snowballs
